node.name: The Turkey-Eurasia Mining Show
node.description: The Turkey-Eurasia Mining Show is the region's premier strategic conference. It's the place where mining companies, government officials investors & solution providers come together to maximise mining potential. The Turkey-Eurasia Mining Show is where business is done & contacts are made. The show offers content for mining companies, natural resource investors, government delegations & more.

node.name: CIEHC 2014
node.description: CIEHC-2 will be a turnkey event covering the opportunities and challenges associated with doing business in the Republic of Congo’s hydrocarbons sector. It will feature a three days of conference sessions, a trade exhibition, interactive workshops and technical and touristic excursions. CIEHC has already established as the leading oil and gas event in the Central African region. The first edition of the event featured: over 500 delegates, 51 speakers and 27 exhibitors emanating from 23 countries

node.name: SURIMEP
node.description: The first Suriname International Mining, Energy & Petroleum Conference and Exhibition (SURIMEP 2014) will take place from 17th to 19th June 2014. The main theme of the event is “Utilising Suriname’s natural resources to underpin a sustainable economy”.

node.name: MAURITANIDES 2014
node.description: The third Mauritanian Mining and Oil & Gas Conference & Exhibition (MAURITANIDES 2014) will take place in Nouakchott, Mauritania from 13 – 15 October 2014. The event will be organised by the Ministry of Petroleum, Energy and Mines, Mauritania in association with the British event organiser AME Trade Limited.

node.name: SIM Senegal
node.description: SIM Senegal has already established itself as one of the largest mining events in West Africa. The second edition of the event in 2012, was opened by His Excellency Macky SALL, President of the Republic of Senegal. It featured over 700 delegates, coming from over 30 countries and included 82 exhibitors.

node.name: Africa PPP
node.description: Private investment is undoubtedly a necessary component for infrastructure development in Africa. Strong infrastructure is vital for GDP growth. The basic purpose of the public private partnership model is to attract and engage private sector investment in projects to develop modern infrastructure and reliable services.

node.name: The Africa Oil & Gas Finance and Investment Forum
node.description: Following the success of the 2013 Africa Oil & Gas Finance and Investment Forum, the event will, this September, once again bring together industry leaders and government bodies alongside investors, analysts and financial institutions to discuss future finance and investment opportunities in African oil & gas.

node.name: ZIMEC 2014
node.description: Organised in association with the Ministry of Mines, Energy and Water Development of Zambia and the Association of Zambian Mineral Exploration Companies (AZMEC), ZIMEC 2014 provides the definitive platform for showcasing Zambia’s mineral and power potential and connecting with industry professionals.

node.name: Rwanda Mining & Energy Conference and Exhibition (RIMEC)
node.description: The inaugural Rwanda Mining & Energy Conference and Exhibition (RIMEC) is organised by AME Trade Ltd in partnership with the Rwanda Development Board. The event aims to showcase all that Rwanda has to offer in terms of mining and power potential, whilst identifying and seeking solutions to challenges faced by investors.

node.name: Risk Management Conference 2014
node.description: Risk Management Conference 2014, will aim to provide a clear understanding of the region's risk management initiatives pertainin to the financial sector. Opportunities will be explored, options will be evaluated and knowledge sharing experiences will lay the proceedings to minimise the wide range of financial risk and subsequently develop proper methods of risk management. The Forum will also delve into the future challenges and brainstorm solutions to eradicate possible threats in the industry.

node.name: Africa Oil & Gas Expo 2014
node.description: The Africa Oil and Gas Expo is Africa’s largest gathering of oil and gas professionals to take place on the African continent. Taking place at the exquisite Sandton Convention Centre, the Africa Oil and Gas Expo brings key decision makers and industry leaders from the four corners of the continent to discuss the latest opportunities, exploration developments and downstream projects occurring in the most exciting region on the planet.

node.name: Cityscape Qatar
node.description: Cityscape Qatar will play host this year to the launch of many new projects, while providing the latest updates from existing developments. In its third year, the event has firmly established itself as the only “must attend” real estate event focused on the bourgeoning Qatari market, and it is the perfect platform for attendees to see and experience how the 2022 FIFA World Cup and the government’s 2030 vision is changing Qatar’s skyline.

node.name: Saudi Energy 2014
node.description: Saudi Energy is the country’s leading energy event. Hundreds of local and international companies and more than 7,000 professional visitors attended Saudi Energy 2013. The event provides a unique platform to view the latest equipment and services from the energy sector, develop international relationships and generate new business opportunities.

node.name: Global Offshore Technology 2014
node.description: Global Offshore Technology is held under the auspices of The Ministry of Energy, Commerce, Industry & Tourism Cyprus. GOT 2014 features Ministerial speakers from Cyprus, Montenegro, Malta, Croatia and Italy and is the only conference and exhibition in Cyprus to feature Ministerial representation from across the region as well as offering a high profile speaker line up of regional and international private sector experts.

node.name: 3rd Annual Cypriot-Greek Oil & Gas 2014 Summit
node.description: THE 3rd ANNUAL CYPRIOT – GREEK OIL & GAS 2014 SUMMIT WILL BUILD ON THE SUCCESS OF OUR PREVIOUS EVENTS, WITH A FRESH FOCUS ON THE GEOSTRATEGIC, ECONOMIC, AND POLITICAL REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT OF HYDROCARBONS RESOURCES IN BOTH CYPRUS AND GREECE, THIS TIME WITH GLOBAL PERSPECTIVES FROM INTERNATIONAL SPEAKERS.

node.name: Gas to Power Turkey Forum 2014
node.description: As a strongly established event and a gathering of reference in the region our 4th Gas to Power Journal Turkey Forum will provide a platform for industry experts to come together to discuss and debate on the key issues relative to Turkey’s gas and power sector.

node.name: Port Finance International Istanbul 2014
node.description: Taking place on 20 & 21 May, Port Finance International Istanbul 2014 will once again bring together attendees from port authorities, terminals, banks and investors, law firms and engineering consultants, logistic and construction companies from Turkey, Bulgaria, Ukraine, Romania and other international locations interested in this exciting market.

node.name: Port Finance International Mexico
node.description: Port Finance International Mexico 2014 is a key meeting place to share views and catch up on the most transcendent themes of maritime port sector.

node.name: The FT Turkey Summit 2014
node.description: FT Live Calendar Following on from the hugely successful inaugural Invest in Turkey Summit in 2012, the FT Turkey Summit 2014 will bring new and veteran investors together with senior government officials, to share their insights on the increasingly significant role of Turkey on the global stage, and the positive shifts in the political and business landscape that are drawing international investors to its shores.

node.name: Latin Infrastructure & Property Development Summit
node.description: The Latin Infrastructure & Property Development Summit will be on 15-16 May at the Trump Ocean Club, Panama. Property developers and infrastructure authorities come together to network with top quality project consultants. Presentation topics that will be discussed include economy watch, expansion in mega projects, hospitality outlook.

node.name: The 5th China Solid Waste Management Summit 2014
node.description: China's largest international solid waste management conference linking project owners, developers and contractors with technology vendors, system integrators, investors and consultants for networking, knowledge-sharing and partnership opportunities.

node.name: European Shale Gas & Oil Summit
node.description: The purpose of the European Shale Gas & Oil Summit is to bring all the key stakeholders together and to direct the industry towards a successful and sustainable future across Europe.

node.name: MIDDLE EAST & NORTH AFRICA SHALE GAS AND OIL SUMMIT 2014
node.description: The MENA Shale Summit - Middle East and North Africa Shale Gas and Oil Summit 2014, September 29th ­ 30th in London brings together key industry leaders and companies involved in shale gas and oil across MENA to highlight complex issues evident in the region, formulate strategy and bond the industry. The event will be attended by an array of professionals working or looking to progress operations within the shale gas and oil sector across MENA.

node.name: Cityscape Jeddah
node.description: Connect with leading real estate professionals, keep up to date with the latest trends in Saudi real estate, and develop business opportunities with over 70 exhibiting companies during a 3 day exhibition you cannot afford to miss.

node.name: EU-Uzbekistan Infrastructure & Alternative Energy Trade & Investment Forum 2014
node.description: EU-Uzbekistan Infrastructure & Alternative Energy Trade & Investment Forum 2014 will be the largest investor`s get together occasion for the country this year with exclusive support and recognition by the Uzbek Government. The program will introduce projects and opportunities for private sector involvement in several sectors – rail, road, transport, municipal and new energy.

node.name: Ethiopia Infrastructure, Power & New Energy Investment Summit 2014
node.description: The Ethiopia Infrastructure, Power & New Energy Investment Summit 2014 will gather state authorities, representatives of IFI`s and large pool of investors, developers, financiers, technology and solution providers on a two day forum introducing the growing opportunities for private sector participation in the country`s infrastructure development and growth.

node.name: The 10th International Energy Conference
node.description: Welcome to the official website of the 10th International Energy conference (IEC) to be held on 26-27 Aug 2014, Tehran-Iran, organized by Iranian National Energy Committee, a member of World Energy Council (WEC).

node.name: 3rd Annual Collateral Management Forum
node.description: The European Bonds & Loans Forum is the only European forum dedicated to the bonds and loans market. In today's dynamic economic environment Collateral Management has become an integral part of each and every financial organization.

node.name: European Bonds & Loans Forum
node.description: The European Bonds & Loans Forum is the only European forum dedicated to the bonds and loans market. This sector has gone through a lot of essential market changes and Regulatory restrictions in the recent years. Investigate why the high yield bond market is booming and why the bank lending has experienced a significant decrease.

node.name: The Jeddah Economic Forum (JEF)
node.description: GCC member countries' national visions have emphasized the need for economic This year's Jeddah Economic Forum will explore 'Growth through Youth', addressing the challenges and opportunities surrounding sustainable job creation for young people, with the objective of facilitating regional growth through strategic and long-term investment in job creation.

node.name: Opportunities in Paraguay 2014
node.description: This conference brings together the most senior government and industry leaders from Paraguay with globally recognized business executives and investors. Below we have listed the kinds of companies and executives that we believe would most benefit from the trade and business mission and unique educational and networking event.

node.name: 2nd Annual Bancassurance Forum
node.description: The aim of our 2nd Annual Bancassurance Forum 2014 is to look at the impact of new requirements Bancassurance has to face and explore how the financial and insurance sector can develop the Bancassurance market and so that it find its place at the heart of the European insurance market.

node.name: 2nd Annual Liquidity Management Forum
node.description: At a time of persisting uncertainty and never seen economic changes with aggressive mandatory frames of demanding, non-indulgent ordinances, corporates’ focus has shifted in a compulsive way. While complying with given guidelines of deploying new requirements, institutes still have to deal with staying innovative and alert, while managing their liquidity on the financial market.

node.name: 4th Annual Risk Management Forum
node.description: Ever since the financial crisis of 2007 the world and mainly financial institutions realized how essential it is to aim not only for success but also to plan out various strategies for undesired scenarios in case the lightning struck. At the 4th Annual Risk Management Forum you will hear about these changes, learn about their foreseeable effects on the economy.

node.name: The 4th India Smart Utilities Week
node.description: Developing smart grids for a promising region with robust growth!

node.name: Smart Grid Southeast Asia Forum 2014
node.description: Developing smart grids for a promising region with robust economic growth!

node.name: Iran Oil & Gas 2014 Summit
node.description: IRN, organiser of High-Profile Summits across the world, is pleased to announce the Iran Oil & Gas Summit, taking place in June 2014. The high-level meeting will bring together experienced IOCs in the Middle East along with world famous experts to discuss pressing business issues around the long overdue normalisation of trade relations with the Islamic Republic of Iran, addressing key opportunities for development of the Iranian Oil and Gas sector.

node.name: Doing Business in Africa Masterclass
node.description: According to The Africa Competitiveness Report 2013 put together by the World Economic Forum, The World Bank, The African Development Bank and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Denmark, there is a growing international attention focused on Africa as an investment destination and mounting talk of an African economic renaissance.

node.name: Kingdom Cyber Security Forum
node.description: The event is an opportunity for professionals to discuss the importance of preparedness, being more proactive instead of reactive. It is worthwhile to address issues like Advanced Persistent Threat (APT’s), Ransomware, SCADA Systems and many other such important subjects.

node.name: Cards & Payments Middle East 2014
node.description: Welcome to Cards & Payments Middle East - the Region’s Largest Smart Card & Payments Show.

node.name: Retail Show Middle East 2014
node.description: Retail Show Middle East 2014 equips and enables retailers to maximise on the big changes in the retail industry as technology advances and consumer behaviour changes.

node.name: The Mobile Show Middle East 2014
node.description: The Middle East's Leading Mobile Innovation Show for Telecoms, Enterprise and Government.

node.name: Invest in Kosovo Forum
node.description: Kosovo is in the forefront of many investors’ minds, given the country’s rapid economic development, strong growth potential and government’s favourable incentives.

node.name: Africa Energy Forum
node.description: Now in its 16th year, the Africa Energy Forum (AEF) is the annual meeting place where global players from the energy industry meet with African governments, utilities and regulators to engage in dialogue aimed at collectively driving forward the development of Africa’s power sector. It is held in a different European city every year, enabling international investors to easily meet with Africa’s key stakeholders.

node.name: The Power Investors Summit
node.description: The inaugural Power Investors Summit: Nigeria attracted over 200 attendees from the power sector, including 73% from West Africa and 30% at Director level and above.

node.name: Turkey & Neighbours Hotel Investment Conference
node.description: CATHIC provides its audience with a carefully choreographed opportunity to meet the industry’s top-level executives with a wide range of specialist knowledge from both the local and international perspective.

node.name: The Emergency Management and Crisis Response Summit
node.description: Today all businesses depend on a secure supply chain of a products and services. Therefore, protecting vital assets stands as their key responsibility. The ever increasing threats of terrorism, natural disasters, and human error pose growing challenges for protecting those critical assets. Plus, information technology, now the bloodline of nearly all economic and social activity, brings new vulnerabilities and even more challenges. To protect these assets, businesses, governments, and the privat

node.name: The APAC Smart Grid Conference
node.description: The APAC Smart Grid Conference by Fleming Gulf is one of the first events that aims to stimulate the thought processes freed from the technology or commercial restraints of ordinary Smart Grid events. The conference will provide you a unique opportunity to meet the industry’s most experienced and knowledgeable smart grid experts all in the same location.

node.name: East Africa Oil & Gas
node.description: East Africa Oil & Gas Summit will continue to act as a platform to assist in developing the future of the hydrocarbon industry in East Africa by focusing primarily on upstream opportunities and investment possibilities in Mozambique, Tanzania, South Sudan, Kenya, Ethiopia, Somalia, Malawi, Seychelles and Uganda.

node.name: GHANA POWER
node.description: On April 10, 2014 Ghana Power attendees will have a chance to discuss creating a competitive, efficient and sustainable power sector in Ghana as well as to hear first-hand from the government about the upcoming investment opportunities in the sector. Renowned speakers, visionary keynotes and interactive discussions are on the agenda when the best power experts gather for this conference.

node.name: GHANA OIL & GAS SUMMIT Conference & Exhibition
node.description: The Ghana Oil and Gas Summit conference and exhibition return to Accra 8-10 April 2014. The conference is the country’s largest and longest running annual oil and gas gathering, which provides structured opportunities to network, learn about the latest investment opportunities and participate in multi-stakeholder discussions on the oil and gas industry. The exhibition, has sold out ever since its introduction in 2011 and with over 100 exhibitors, it also became the largest show in Ghana.

node.name: 2nd Mexico Mining Summit
node.description: BNamericas events has the pleasure to present its second Mexico Mining Summit. At this event, important industry players will analyze the major ongoing silver, gold and copper projects; financing options; the role of capital markets; developments in the mining law and their consequences; the future of juniors; as well as the social, environmental and security challenges in Mexico’s mining industry.

node.name: 5th South America Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The 5th South America Infrastructure Summit will analyze new public-private partnership projects (PPPs), new infrastructure projects that promote regional integration and competitiveness of countries, new technologies and financing challenges in the industry.

node.name: 11th Southern Cone Energy Summit
node.description: For the 11th consecutive year the Southern Cone Energy Summit will bring together the principal industry players to discuss advancements in the hydrocarbon sector in Peru, the urgent challenges of power generation in Chile, shale oil and gas fever in Argentina and investment plans in gas transmission infrastructure and power transmission in the Latin American Southern Cone.

node.name: 3rd Mexico Telecom Summit
node.description: The third telecommunications Summit to be held in Mexico will provide detailed information about the changes taking place in the telecommunications industry in the country after the reform of 2013.

node.name: 2nd Latam Oil & Gas Summit
node.description: Latin America has become one of the main drivers of the global petroleum industry due to its deep-water reserves and non-conventional hydrocarbon projects, as well as the multi-million-dollar investments in their development.

node.name: IFN Forum Kuwait 2014
node.description: With a view to bring forth opportunities within Kuwait and draw investors into the country to support opportunities within the oil and gas and infrastructure sector, the IFN Kuwait Forum happening for the first time in 2014, is expected to attract issuers and investors into one of the GCC’s most vibrant markets.

node.name: IFN Global Forum 2014
node.description: he annual IFN Global Forum is expected to be the largest event of the year, boasting industry players from established and up-and-coming markets across the world and bringing together the best and brightest in the industry to discuss key issues on a global platform.

node.name: IFN Forum Turkey 2014
node.description: First held in 2009, the IFN Roadshow in Istanbul has continued to develop and mature. Hosted and held at Borsa Istanbul, a body which has been instrumental in creating traction in Islamic finance within the Turkish market, the 2013 event witnessed over 200 senior industry practitioners attend from 15 countries. In 2014, with more support than before, we expect audience numbers to increase yet again. The IFN Turkey Forum is the go-to event for those looking to breach the Middle East and European

node.name: IFN Forum Iran 2014
node.description: The Iranian capital market has also gradually begun to open up to Shariah compliant funds, including ETFs, and instruments to allow for liquidity management and the flow of funds within the interbank money market. Support from the government and its regulators are crucial at this juncture, to allow for growth within the Iranian Islamic banking system.

node.name: IFN Forum Saudi Arabia
node.description: Through a series of exclusive regulatory country presentations, practitioner-led round-table discussions, non-debatable power presentations, original case studies and sector focused side sessions, the IFN Saudi Arabia forum in 2013 will again be the key, must-attend industry event for issuers, investors, regulators and all financial intermediaries involved in the Islamic financial markets with interest in the Saudi Arabian market.

node.name: Middle East Electricity
node.description: Middle East Electricity is the largest meeting place for energy industry professionals from over 100 countries worldwide.

node.name: Morocco Oil & Gas 2014 Summit
node.description: The Morocco Oil & Gas 2014 Summit, taking place on the 7-8 May in Marrakech, will address a number of key issues, such as the geological landscape onshore and offshore Morocco, the new oil and gas governmental strategy, the legal framework, the international opening approach and more. For the first time, a senior-level platform will be dedicated entirely to Morocco to highlight the country’s untapped potential and reinforce its image of an emerging hydrocarbon market.

node.name: CFO Summit Africa
node.description: The CFO Summit Africa explores emerging trends and new business shifts as sustainable growth becomes institutionalized as a requisite strategy and best practice.

node.name: Pakistan Oil & Gas 2014 Summit
node.description: The Pakistan Oil & Gas 2014 Summit will be a high profile platform giving coverage to all elements of developments in the country. Governmental Officials, NOCs and IOCs will share insights on the legal framework, geology and proven reserves pipeline routes, technical issues, key threats onshore and offshore, emerging technologies, and forthcoming opportunities for investors and operators to get involved and benefit from the lucrative potential in the country.

node.name: 17th Eurasian Economic Summit
node.description: The 17th Eurasian Economic Summit, that will provide a ground to the countries of the world for their economic, political and social cooperation and their joint development, is perceived in the international arena as a commercial experience, a platform of cooperation for thought and civil initiative and a gathering of prestige.

node.name: Investing in Turkey Forum
node.description: Whether you are looking to enhance your presence in the Turkish market, meet new clients, learn about Private Equity, Privatisations, PPPs and the Energy market or simply wanting to find out about the opportunities in Turkey, this event will exceed all your requirements.

node.name: Asia Trade Finance Week 2014
node.description: Global Trade Review’s Asia Trade Finance Week 2014, incorporating the 6th Annual Asia Trade & Export Finance Conference, alongside various stream sessions, roundtables, workshops and networking events, will take place in Singapore on September 9-11, 2014. Now accepted as the world’s premier trade finance gathering for discussing key regional and global themes, the event is expected to welcome over 600 high level delegates, including companies of all sizes from all manner of sectors.

node.name: 2nd Annual North America Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Global Trade Review returns to New York City in June 2014 for the next instalment of the North America Trade & Export Finance Conference, where business leaders from across the US and Canada will gather to discuss the key concerns of those conducting cross border trade and the role of the financial sector in securing business with high-growth emerging markets.

node.name: Europe Trade Finance Week 2014
node.description: As the continent’s leading gathering for trade, export, commodity and supply chain finance professionals, Europe Trade Finance Week 2014 will take place in Hamburg on June 11-13, 2014. The event will incorporate the long running annual Europe Trade & Supply Chain Finance Conference, as well as the Supply Chain Masterclass, GTR Editorial Board Meeting and numerous networking events.

node.name: 6th Annual East Africa Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Global Trade Review is delighted to once again return to Nairobi for the largest gathering of trade finance specialists in East Africa. The 6th Annual East Africa Trade & Commodity Finance Conference will bring together domestic, regional and international trade leaders to explore the latest developments, challenges and key issues facing this exciting and lucrative market.

node.name: 4th Annual Indonesia Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Jakarta will again host Global Trade Review’s Indonesia Trade & Commodity Finance Conference, now in its 4th year. This leading industry event has rightly gained the reputation as the preeminent meeting of trade and commodity finance specialists, where discussion of key themes will take place as well as unrivaled networking for anyone serious about doing business in Indonesia.

node.name: 4th Annual Latin America Trade & Commodity Finance Conference
node.description: Once again providing the definitive meeting point for those high level decision makers operating in or looking to do business in Latin America, this is the most comprehensive gathering of leading trade finance practitioners in the region, and is well placed to address the abundance of opportunities and challenges this exciting region holds. Simultaneous English/Portuguese translation at the conference will allow all delegates to fully immerse themselves in proceedings.

node.name: 8th Annual Turkey Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Enjoying full recognition as the premier annual event for Turkey’s leading businesses and those trade, export and commodity financiers and associated sectors tasked with supporting their international trade, the conference will again provide deep insight on the trends and challenges being experienced by those operating in this exciting market alongside extensive networking across an international audience that remains unrivaled throughout Turkey and the wider region.

node.name: Africa Trade Finance Week 2014
node.description: Incorporating the 8th Annual Africa Trade & Export Finance Conference, Supply Chain Masterclass, GTR Africa Leaders in Trade Awards and numerous networking functions, the event is now recognised as the world’s leading pan-African trade gathering, having established the reputation for bringing only the most senior corporate, bankers and global policy makers together under one roof. This will provide the ideal setting to discuss the latest developments and examine both the regional and internation

node.name: Middle East Trade Finance Week 2014
node.description: Incorporating the 11th Annual Middle East Trade & Export Finance Conference, ICC Regional Banking Commission Mena Technology Forum, Supply Chain Masterclass, EMEA Finance Middle East Banking Awards and numerous networking functions, this event has built an unsurpassed reputation for bringing together all leading trade and export finance professionals under one roof.

node.name: 10th Annual India Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Now in its 10th year and recognised as the conference of choice for the region’s trade finance community, this much anticipated annual gathering looks set to welcome over 250 high-level business leaders keen to discuss the most pertinent issues affecting both domestic and international players. Enjoying participation from companies of all sizes from all manner of sectors, the conference is a must attend event for anyone looking to do business with one of the world’s most burgeoning economies.

node.name: 7th Annual Russia & CIS Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Now established as the only place for key business leaders to meet to discuss the ever-changing trade landscape in Russia and the wider region, the event will draw on record attendance in 2013 to further highlight the huge opportunities within this lucrative market.

node.name: The 6th Annual Private Equity Brazil Forum
node.description: The 6th Annual Private Equity Brazil Forum is South America's largest international private markets investment conference. The forum brings together 600+ investors, funds, and advisors for a two day meeting discussing sectors, due diligence, and private equity investment opportunities in Brazil and around the world.

node.name: The Real Estate Mexico Forum 2013
node.description: The Real Estate Mexico Forum 2013 is a unique senior level executive forum pertaining to the interests of both International and Mexican institutional investors in Latin America.

node.name: Mexico Investors Forum
node.description: Latin Markets presents Mexico's largest investor forum on November 2014. This year's event is a unique opportunity to meet with more than 300 institutional investors, asset managers, government regulators and consultants from Mexico and around the world.

node.name: The 3rd Annual Colombia Capital Projects and Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The 3rd Annual Colombia Capital Projects and Infrastructure Summit from Latin Markets marks the return of one of the largest gatherings of global infrastructure developers and investors in Colombia.

node.name: MEXICO ENERGY SUMMIT 2014
node.description: As energy demand in Mexico continues to grow, local energy authorities have rolled out a significant amount of new concessions in recent months, which have attracted investor interest locally and abroad.

node.name: The Private Equity Andean Forum
node.description: The Private Equity Andean Forum builds upon the success of our private equity series to bring a specific focus to Latin Americas’ most exciting new private equity markets. As these markets mature, growing companies starved for funding have led massive growth in the local private equity deals.

node.name: The 3rd Annual Peru Capital Projects and Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The 3rd Annual Peru Capital Projects and Infrastructure Summit is preparing for 2014 a premier gathering of global public and private infrastructure developers and investors in Peru, brought to you by Latin Markets.

node.name: The Mexico Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit 2014
node.description: The Mexico Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit 2014 is the premier gathering of global public and private infrastructure developers and investors in Mexico, brought to you by Latin Markets.

node.name: COLOMBIA ENERGY SUMMIT 2014
node.description: Local and international firms are looking to better understand the dynamic and opportunities available in the market, and the COLOMBIA ENERGY SUMMIT 2014, will expose these opportunities to the market over the course of 2 days of compelling content and networking.

node.name: The 3rd Annual Private Equity Latin America Forum
node.description: The 3rd Annual Private Equity Latin America Forum is a meeting of the world’s largest international private equity managers and investors. The forum brings together 400+ investors, funds, and advisors for a two day meeting discussing sectors, due diligence, and private equity investment opportunities in Brazil, throughout Latin America and around the world.

node.name: The Pension Fund Brazil Forum
node.description: The Pension Fund Brazil Forum was designed in collaboration with leading Brazilian pension fund decision makers to support the Brazilian pension funds who are confronted with falling local interest rates, the threat of inflation at home and rapidly increasing liabilities tied to an increasingly robust but aging middle class.

node.name: The Hedge Fund Brazil Forum
node.description: The Hedge Fund Brazil Forum is Latin America’s most specialized international meeting of hedge funds, long only funds, Brazilian pension funds, Latin American pension funds, latin American family offices and global endowments, foundations, sovereign wealth funds and pension funds.

node.name: The Peruvian Investors Forum
node.description: The Peruvian Investors Forum provides Peruvian pension funds, family offices, private banks, insurance funds and sovereign wealth funds, along with pensions and families from Ecuador, Uruguay and Argentina and asset managers from Peru, the Andean states and the global industry with a due diligence platform to explore and discuss trends and opportunities.

node.name: PERU ENERGY SUMMIT 2014
node.description: Local and international firms are looking to better understand the dynamic and opportunities available in the market, and the PERU ENERGY SUMMIT 2014, will expose these opportunities to the market over the course of 2 days of compelling content and networking.

node.name: The Andean Institutional Real Estate Forum
node.description: The Andean Institutional Real Estate Forum is the region's leading platform for international and local LPs and GPs looking for allocation and JV opportunities in Colombia, Chile, Peru, Uruguay, and beyond.

node.name: The Private Wealth Panama Forum
node.description: The Private Wealth Panama Forum is a Panama focused asset protection meeting for private banks, HNWIs, wealth managers, trust companies, legal professionals and other intermediaries. The Forum brings together 200+ industry leaders from Panama and around the world to discuss private banking, tax, trust, bearer shares, foundations, corporate structures, estate planning and wealth growth in one of the world’s banking and legal centers.

node.name: Colombian Investors Forum
node.description: Over the course of two days, more than 300 leaders from Colombia, broader Latin America and the global fund industry will be coming together to engage in a discussion of asset allocation, regulatory change, portfolio diversification, due diligence and investment strategy across asset classes, including equities, private markets, hedge funds, debt, commodities, ETFs and real estate.

node.name: 3rd Annual PPP in Turkey Forum
node.description: You will meet senior government officials, local authorities, development banks and IFIs, investment/private banks, private equity pension/insurance funds, construction/concession companies, specialist project financing advisors/consultants, legal firms and PPP/PFI experts from across Europe.

node.name: 4th Turkey Private Equity and Venture Capital Forum
node.description: Building on the success of our regional and London-based Investment and Infrastructure forums on Turkey, our 2014 summit will provide a specialist arena for international and domestic investors and market stakeholders to meet and discuss the future of the Turkish Private Equity and Venture Capital market. The panel of speakers will include regional and international experts, able to offer best practice solutions to the specific challenges facing future growth in this expanding market.

node.name: 6th Turkey Energy Forum
node.description: Our Turkey Energy Event for 2014 will be directed towards renewable and non-renewable energy. Inviting key players to discuss and challenge the current developments in the market along with solutions to increase the interaction between international players in the Turkish market.

node.name: Africa Hotels Investment Forum
node.description: AHIF 2013 took place at the InterContinental Nairobi on September 23-25 as planned. We would like to take this opportunity to thank all the 400 who attended for making it such a great success.

node.name: AHIC 2014
node.description: Welcome to AHIC 2014, we hope you can join us in celebrating our 10th year! AHIC has proven to be the Middle East's annual meeting place for the region's most senior hotel investors, developers, operators and advisors. It is the annual conference that connects business leaders from international and local markets to do deals accross the region.

node.name: The World Takaful Conference
node.description: he World Takaful Conference (WTC 2014), now in its 9th successful year as the world’s largest gathering of international Takaful industry leaders. With huge untapped growth potential in the Islamic insurance industry and the increasing interest of the leading conventional insurance players and major banks in the sector, the 9th Annual gathering promises to be even more influential.

node.name: 2nd Coaltrans Poland
node.description: As Poland continues to face pressure from the European Union to comply with its low carbon policy, the domestic coal industry is also increasingly drawn into the global market. After a successful first event in the heart of Poland’s coal mining region, Coaltrans Poland is pleased to announce its move to the coastal city of Sopot for its second edition.

node.name: Istanbul Finance Summit
node.description: İstanbul Finance Summit which has becoming an international event, is planned to be held for the 5th time in İstanbul in September 15-16, 2014. IFS’14 will host some of the most important figures of global economy and finance from North America, Europe, the Gulf Region and East Asia.

node.name: 2nd Annual Central American & Caribbean Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit
node.description: Latin Markets is pleased to present the 2nd Annual Central American & Caribbean Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit, taking place January 28-29, 2014 at the Trump Ocean Club in Panama City. Formerly as the Panama Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit, this year the Summit will cover a wider scope of projects across the region, and their implications to the Panamanian market.

node.name: CITYSCAPE ABU DHABI 2014
node.description: Abu Dhabi's only real estate investment and development event opened its doors again on April 16th for the seventh edition of the most signiﬁcant annual gathering of the real estate professionals and investors.

node.name: CITYSCAPE GLOBAL
node.description: The latest in Real Estate. See it first at Cityscape.

node.name: Middle East Insurance Forum (MEIF)
node.description: For a decade now the annual Middle East Insurance Forum (MEIF) has been at the forefront of the regional insurance industry, firmly establishing its reputation as the region's largest and most influential gathering of insurance industry leaders.

node.name: Unconventional Gas Asia Summit, Indonesia 2014
node.description: The exploration and development of unconventional hydrocarbon resources is seen as the key to bridging this potentially damaging supply-and-demand gap. Gas has been specified by the Indonesian government’s national energy policy to make up at least 30% of the energy mix, especially for power generation purposes, with CBM in particular to make up 3% of that mix by 2025.

node.name: Unconventional Gas Asia Summit, China 2014
node.description: With the natural gas price peak in the past decades, the whole world is renewing its interest in development of unconventional gas resources. And plus the increase in technological capabilities (horizontal drilling coupled with hydraulic fracturing technology), particularly with respect to shale gas E&P, which as recently as a few years ago were deemed economically unfeasible given the high production costs can be recovered economically in nowadays.

node.name: Unconventional Gas Asia Summit, India 2014
node.description: Following on the great success of UGAS, India 2013, we are proud to announce the 2nd Annual Unconventional Gas Asia Summit, India will be held from March 25 to 26, 2014 in New Delhi, India.

node.name: Unconventional Gas Convention Europe 2014
node.description: With the US already successfully sitting on a number of vast shale plays, European unconventional gas exploration seems to be highly promising, especially the shale gas in Poland, UK, as well as Ukraine, which may well reshape the continent’s energy market dynamics by easing reliance on Russian natural gas imports.

node.name: 4th Annual Middle East and Africa Insurance Summit
node.description: Over 2 days, 4th Annual Middle East&Africa Insurance Summit will gather industry peers to brainstorm on solutions that will achieve the vision to have a regulated,consolidated and lucrative business model in the dynamic and ever-growing insurance sector.This summit will address burning issues and challenges faced by the MEA region and brainstorm on solutions that will achieve the vision to have a regulated,consolidated and lucrative business model in the dynamic and ever-growing insurance sect

node.name: 19th Annual Cards & Payments Asia
node.description: The 19th annual Cards & Payments Asia and its 8 co-located events will host 7,000 attendees and over 200 international exhibitors across 10,000sqm of exhibition space. It is a platform for the convergence of the entire cards and payments ecosystem. This is where you meet system integrators and key customers across the banking, retail, telecoms, government sectors who matter to your business.

node.name: The Global Restaurant Investment Forum
node.description: The Global Restaurant Investment Forum (GRIF), is the inaugural event for the restaurant and hospitality community. It is the meeting place for investors, hoteliers, owners, lenders, F&B brands, restaurant concepts, franchisors, franchisees, suppliers and other key industry professionals across the region to gain confidence in the market and share best practices with the industry.

node.name: Central & East Africa Mining Investment Summit
node.description: The Central and East Africa Mining Investment Summit will provide a chance for you to hear from the international community on how risks like tax and mining codes can be managed. Thought provoking case studies will be presented alongside panel debates on strategies for improving power supply of managing resource nationalism.

node.name: Mongolia Investment Summit
node.description: Building on its successful launch in 2013 the Mongolia Investment Summit London 2014 is set to remain the only forum of its size and quality, accurately showcasing Mongolia’s vast opportunities to London’s investment community. Bringing delegates an additional post-summit workshop, a fully updated agenda, greater ministerial participation and more senior investors the 2014 event is not to be missed.

node.name: West Africa Mining Investment Summit
node.description: West Africa is an area of high risk but potentially high reward. If you get a mining investment right there is a significant amount of money to be made. The challenge is managing political, infrastructural and security risks.

node.name: ICSG Istanbul 2014
node.description: The main purpose of smart grids is to prevent power cuts through automatic measuring systems by conducting situation analysis; to provide grid reliability by controlling over loads and failures; to include renewable energy resources into the system and; to control uncontrollable, untraceable energy consumption and losses via this system.

node.name: WFES 2014
node.description: Building on the high profile successes of WFES 2013, the 7th annual gathering of future energy’s world leaders will be home to brilliant minds and inspiring thinkers for three days of expert debate and world class innovation in the heart of Abu Dhabi.

node.name: The Middle East Retail Banking Forum
node.description: The Middle East Retail Banking Series is the only platform in the region that is being hosted successfully on an annual basis, bringing together industry guru’s and practitioners all under one roof. This event has evolved over the last 8 years and is now widely recognized in the region as the best retail banking event.

node.name: 4th Annual Roads Middle East
node.description: With the number of current and future road projects currently underway in the Middle East, including the Dukhan Highway, Lusail Expressway and F-Ring Road projects in Qatar, as well as local road and drainage projects in Doha, Dubai and Abu Dhabi, local authorities, contractors and leading consultants all agree that planning, delivery and asset management remain a top priority.

node.name: The Future of Global Takaful
node.description: The Future of Global Takaful Forum is a senior level event aimed to provide a platform for senior executive leaders in the Takaful industry to engage in critical discussions on strategies and challenges faced by them to boost the growth and profitability in the international Takaful market.

node.name: Turkey Oil and Gas 2014 Summit
node.description: Turkey is a promising region surrounded by significant oil and gas basins and a large network of pipelines crossing its territory. It is believed that Turkey will play an important role as an energy transit hub from central Russia to the Caspian region and from the Middle East to Europe.

node.name: 3rd Mexico Infrastructure Summit
node.description: Mexico's infrastructure program calls for public and private investments in the tune of US$46 billion, a figure that does not include the investment needed to build a new airport for Mexico City. One of the highlights of the program, according to President Enrique Peña Nieto, is the goal of having four world-class ports in Mexico.

node.name: 2nd Mexico Energy Summit
node.description: Following last year's success, BNamericas Events intends to repeat the satisfying experience of providing the best knowledge in the energy sector with the 2nd Mexico Energy Summit. The event will have a special emphasis on the new model to be developed in Mexico's oil sector following the energy reform which will be passed by the end of 2013.

node.name: Latam Ports & Logistics Summit
node.description: BNamericas Events has the pleasure to announce our new summit for 2014. The LatAm Ports & Logistics Summit will highlight the main port and logistics projects in Latin America, the framework in which they develop, the factors that will shape the business environment, and the trends occurring within the sector.

node.name: 4th Latam Power Generation Summit
node.description: In order to meet our clients' expectations BNamericas Events will hold the fourth version of the LatAm Power Generation Summit which will focus on analyzing the energy generation environment in the region, the main challenges faced by the industry and the business opportunities that arise.

node.name: 8th Andean Energy Summit
node.description: BNamericas Events is proud to bring the eighth version of the Andean Energy Summit. This year the summit will be held in Bogota, Colombia and will focus on the country's efforts to build lines towards Central America and the Southern Cone. It will analyze the future plans of private companies as well as the strategy used by Colombian power utilities to become regional actors. The progress of Ecopetrol's investment plan will also be discussed during the event.

node.name: South Caucasus Infrastructure and New Energy Investment Summit 2014
node.description: The South Caucasus Infrastructure & New Energy Investment Summit will take place within the framework of Expo Georgia's international City Infrastructure Exhibition in Tbilisi, under the Auspices of the Ministry of Regional Development and Infrastructure of Georgia and the Ministry of Energy and Natural Resources of Georgia.

node.name: The Knowledge Sharing Conference
node.description: Sharing knowledge and new technologies to develop a world-class electricity sector within Oman.

node.name: Oman Construction Summit 2014
node.description: Following the success of Oman Construction Summit 2013, IQPC and GEC are pleased to announce that the Oman Construction Summit 2014 will take place at the Grand Hyatt Muscat, Oman from 26 - 29 January 2014.

node.name: The World Islamic Banking Conference
node.description: The World's Largest and Most Influential Annual Gathering of International Islamic Finance Industry Leaders to Fast-Track International Growth Opportunities this December.

node.name: Coaltrans Mozambique
node.description: Coaltrans is delighted to return to Mozambique with a brand new approach to the conference model. Featuring a format of panel discussions and roundtables, the opportunity to ask anonymous questions, and with press access restricted to keynote sessions only, this will be a unique opportunity to get to the heart of the key issues that are shaping Mozambique's coal sector.

node.name: The BIG Show 2014
node.description: The BIG Show (Builders International Gathering) is an annual international exhibition that caters to the building and construction industry in Oman, the Middle East and global markets. It features an extensive range of the latest building materials, construction equipment, wood machinery, interior furnishings and other products, equipment and technology for building and construction operations.

node.name: The 4th Annual Business Continuity & Emergency Response Forum
node.description: The 4th Annual Business Continuity & Emergency Response Forum comes back to Abu Dhabi on the 11th to 13th of February 2014.

node.name: The Latam Retail Banking Conference
node.description: The Latam Retail Banking Conference will bring together top retail banking executives from the region to discuss and debate on the best industry practices.

node.name: Webit Congress 2013
node.description: The 5th edition of the annual Webit Congress on 6-7 November 2013 expects 8000+ attendees from 100+ countries, 200 first-world-class speakers, 500+ media reporters and official bloggers.

node.name: Fourth Kazakhstan Business Forum (KBF 2013)
node.description: KBF 2013, organized on the backbone of Prime Minister David Cameron’s visit to Kazakhstan by Kazakh-British Chamber of Commerce in close partnership with Government, National Bank of Kazakhstan, Sovereign Wealth Fund “Samruk-Kazyna” and the Embassy of the Republic of Kazakhstan in the UK, represents one of the few events held beyond the boundaries of Kazakhstan to discuss key trends and developments in the economic and business environment of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

node.name: IFN Saudi Arabia Forum 2013
node.description: Considered to be one of the key markets to watch, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has proved its potential in the capital markets issuance space in 2012, with a slew of high-profile Sukuk issuances backed by the Saudi Arabian government. The single largest Sukuk issue ever originated from Saudi Arabia in January 2012, worth US$4 billion, by the General Authority of Civil Aviation.

node.name: The International Property Show
node.description: The IPS (International Property Show) is an innovative event held annually in Dubai for companies that are involved in sale of real estate and property to different buyers. It is accredited by the Dubai Real Estate Regulatory Authority (RERA) so that companies can improve their profitability, enhance competitive advantage, and sell properties to visitors and investors.

node.name: The Annual Investment Meeting 2014 (AIM)
node.description: AIM is a premier three-day FDI focused event that includes an executive thought leadership conference, a ministerial roundtable, country presentations, workshops, an exhibition and investment awards. AIM presents itself as the new emerging markets FDI stimulator, fast developing economies growth incubator, and semi-industrialized nations leadership partner.

node.name: World Intelligent Cities Summit 2013
node.description: WICS (World Intelligent Cities Summit) will take place in Istanbul, Turkey. It is the highest level business summit and exhibition dedicated to the development of truly 21st century connected and sustainable cities.

node.name: Middle East Rail 2014
node.description: Middle East Rail is a huge rail exhibition and conference. It's designed to help operators build and operate brand new rail infrastructure, as well as upgrading legacy networks.

node.name: 5th Turkey Renewables Congress and Exhibition
node.description: Join leading public and private experts in a dynamic networking and learning environment to debate and solve the current issues facing the development of the Turkish renewable market, such as market trends and analysis, solar energy, wind energy, geothermal, hydro, and biomass in Turkey.

node.name: Solar Middle East
node.description: After a hugely successful launch in 2013, Solar Middle East returns to Dubai for the second edition in 2014. Running alongside the world’s leading power event - Middle East Electricity, Solar Middle East provides the ideal meeting place for solar industry professionals from across the globe.

node.name: Africa Electricity
node.location: Sandton Convention Centre, Johannesburg, S. Africa
node.description: Africa Electricity is an exhibition and conference from the team behind the hugely successful Middle East Electricity. In 2012, visitors came from as far east as China and as far west as the USA to attend the Africa Electricity exhibition and hugely popular conference. Africa Electricity has now become the place for energy professionals to network, learn, source solutions and do business in southern Africa.

node.name: Power Nigeria
node.description:
Lagos, the commercial hub of Nigeria, will host the second edition of the Power Nigeria exhibition on 2 - 4 October 2013.
Power Nigeria serves as a comprehensive showcase for these core segments of the power and energy industry:
Power generation, transmission & distribution Lighting New & renewable energy Nuclear energy Water

node.name: Global Thinkers Forum
node.description: A conversation on Leadership and Collaboration in Shifting environments is more imperative than ever and very timely and relevant in Turkey this year and for what the future holds. The recent events in Taksim Square which triggered this wave of reaction across the country provides the field for a conversation around leadership staying in touch with its human capital, the needs of a world that is constantly changing and decision-making in societies.

node.name: The 4th Istanbul Finance Summit
node.description: The 4th Istanbul Finance Summit (IFS'13), to be held between 18-19 September,2013 will host important figures of the global financial world from North America, Europe, the Gulf Region and East Asia. The summit will provide a platform for state-of-the-art discussions on the current condition and future direction of world finance and will bring together leading global policy makers, bankers, corporate financiers and regulators, among others.

node.name: Biomass Power & Pellets Brazil
node.description: Over 250 attendees will gather in Sao Paulo this November to network and hear over 50 of the sector's leading thinkers and operators debate the key opportunities and challenges for the Brazilian market over the next 12 months. If you are involved in the solid biomass, waste-to-energy and power sectors, this event cannot be missed.

node.name: Infrastructure Investment World Europe
node.description: Now in its 8th year, Infrastructure Investment World Europe is the annual meeting place for the entire value chain of Europe’s Infrastructure investment community. This year the focus is on examining market trends, the impact of regulatory intervention, portfolio construction and new investment opportunities.

node.name: Asian Bond Summit 2013
node.description: The unique bond conference brand Asian Bond Summit 2013 will gather 250+world class decision makers, 18+high-level speakers and panelists will present a day full networking event including 6 industry keynote speaking, 3 in-depth Panel Discussion & Brainstorm. And moreover, some hottest topics, such as interest rate liberalization, default risk, Dim Sum VS USD financing, will be discussed with huge experience and case studies.

node.name: IFN Turkey Roadshow 2013
node.description: Bringing you presentations, case studies, key-notes and round-table discussions, the IFN Turkey Roadshow 2013 will once again be the must-attend event for practitioners and professionals who have an active interest in Islamic finance in Turkey.

node.name: MEI Summit
node.description: The MEI Summit is a premium forum bringing together regional institutional investors with the most renowned fund and asset managers worldwide. As an invitation-only event taking place behind closed doors, the summit offers sophisticated institutional investors and international solution providers an intimate environment for a focused discussion on the latest strategies in asset allocation, portfolio construction and diversification.

node.name: The Kyrgyzstan Infrastructure & New Energy Investment Conference
node.description: Kyrgyzstan is entering a new phase of economic development by concentrating its efforts on co-operation and sustainable growth - particularly in the sectors of municipal and rural infrastructure, environmental urban projects, transport and new energy.

node.name: Shale Gas World
node.description: The 4th Annual Shale Gas World Europe brings together more E&P companies, service providers, and government representatives from across Europe than any other pan European unconventional event you might consider attending.

node.name: 9th Annual OPEX 2013 – The Financial COO Event
node.description: 9th Annual OPEX 2013 – The Financial COO Event of the Year, is the ninth edition of annual conferences on achieving operational excellence in banking and finance.

node.name: 4th Annual Middle East SME Forum
node.description: 4th Middle East SME Forum is a collaborative knowledge sharing platform to exchange the unique ideas on the latest updates of trends, best practices and success stories of Small and Medium Enterprise.

node.name: 5th World Islamic Retail Banking Conference
node.description: 5th World Islamic Retail Banking Conference brings forth the opportunity to grasp and brainstorm market trends and insights, in-depth dialogues from global and local practitioners and phenomenal networking opportunities with key policy makers, Islamic scholars, global Islamic retail bankers and business decision makers.

node.name: Expo China 2013
node.description: Expo China 2013, an international exhibition of machinery and products from over 80 Chinese companies from Zhejiang Province, with the participation of delegations from Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Costa Rica, together with more than 60 companies in Ecuador.

node.name: East Africa Oil and Gas Summit (EAOGS)
node.description: The 2nd East Africa Oil and Gas Summit (EAOGS) will take place 29-30 October 2013 at the Intercontinental, Nairobi and the Summit will build on the success of EAOGS 2012 which was co-hosted by the Ministry of Energy Kenya and welcomed 326 delegates from over 170 companies from 29 countries. EAOGS has firmly made its mark as the most prestigious annual ministry led Oil & Gas Summit in East Africa with excellent feedback from delegates across the board.

node.name: Cards & Payments Turkey
node.description: Discover new card, payment & ID technologies at Cards & Payments Turkey in September 2013. This is an event that will inspire, innovate and educate the top players in the payments industry.Attendees will get a hands-on look at the most revolutionary cards, payments and ID technologies at the 50+ stand expo, and will be attend 2 packed days of conference sessions.

node.name: Tanzania Oil and Gas Suppliers Conference
node.description: Tanzania Oil and Gas Suppliers Conference (TOGSC) is a conference cum exhibition that will bring together key players from the supply chain together with stakeholders from the government and the oil and gas industry to discuss and engage on the different opportunities and challenges within the East Africa Scenario particularly Tanzania.

node.name: The 2nd Lebanon International Oil and Gas Summit (LIOG)
node.description: The Lebanon International Oil and Gas Summit (LIOG) 2013 is held under the patronage of the Ministry of Energy and Water (MEW), in collaboration with the Lebanon Petroleum Administration and is endorsed by the International Gas Union (IGU). LIOG 2013 will build on the success of LIOG 2012 which was a great success welcoming 332 delegates from 153 companies from 23 different countries.

node.name: The Morocco Summit
node.description: Morocco is an emerging market at the crossroads of Europe, Africa and the Middle East. With a fast and efficient customs service and 16 regional investment centers, Morocco is now being recognised as a promising country for foreign investors.

node.name: RETECH 2013: The Renewable Energy Technology Conference & Exhibition
node.description: This September thousands of business leaders, investors, technology innovators, federal and state government officials and university educators – representing every aspect of the renewable energy industry – will unite for three days in Washington, DC.

node.name: Bonds, Loans & Sukuk Turkey 2013
node.description: Bonds, Loans & Sukuk Turkey 2013 is the only conference bringing together issuers, borrowers, investors and bankers to discuss the developments of local and international bond, syndicated loan and sukuk markets.

node.name: The GCC Intermodal Transport Summit
node.description: With billions pumped in the transport sector, including ports and rail, the GCC will see an exponential growth in intermodal transport. The GCC Intermodal Transport Summit will look into an array of topics spanning cross border regulation, operational improvement, sustainable and cost effective logistics, freight transport safety and technology and solutions to upgrade ports and rail networks. The conference will talk of the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead with intermodal transportat

node.name: Africa's digital, marketing and commerce show!
node.description: Africa's digital, marketing and commerce show!

node.name: Nacala Infrastructure Development Corridor
node.description: Forming part of IQPC leading global portfolio Nacala Infrastructure development Corridor 2013 conference, will be a local and international gathering of government investors and sponsors.

node.name: 4th Waste Management Middle East Forum
node.description: Our cities are bursting at the seams with overpopulation, urban construction & plethora of environment challenges. Development of integrated & sustainable waste management is one of the growing need of the hour. Waste generation from the urban areas in the Middle eastern region is over 150 million tons per year. Facts & figures of the region has compelled policy-makers and stake holders to promote sustainable waste management strategies & innovative technology in the field.

node.name: Global Gas Opportunities Summit
node.description: The gas industry over the years has witnessed a lot of developments, be it infrastructural advancement, extraction methods or designing efficient gas networks. Surmounting cross border challenges like transportation, production and effective investment is paramount to ensure sustained growth.

node.name: 4th Annual Middle East FireSafe
node.description: After 3 successful editions, we are happy to announce the 4th Annual Middle East FireSafe in the city of Dubai, from September 23th to 25th 2013.

node.name: Shale Gas World UK 2013
node.description: Shale Gas World UK is where you’ll meet the leading operators and key stakeholders in shale gas and unconventional resource development in the UK. Learn from Eric Vaughn at Cuadrilla and Andrew Austin at IGas how they intend to commercialise shale gas reserves.

node.name: Cityscape Qatar
node.description: Cityscape Qatar, backed by industry leaders, is an event that will support this continued real estate growth by providing a platform that will highlight high growth investment opportunities, showcase innovative products and underline sustainable developments.

node.name: Southern Africa Oil & Gas Summit 2013
node.description:
This is the only event of its kind in the world to focus entirely on opportunities in the Oil & Gas sector of the Southern African region.
For further details, please contact: charlotte@oliverkinross.com

node.name: 2nd New Libya Oil & Gas Forum 2013
node.description: We will have the involvement of the NOC Libya, Government Officials, International Oil Companies and Service Providers already in or looking to get involved in Libya and the latest developments in this sector.

node.name: Oil & Gas Security 2013 Summit
node.description: With increasing amounts of oil and gas exploration and production taking place in areas considered high risk, security issues specifically associated with such regions will be thoroughly addressed over the course of this Summit.

node.name: The Azerbaijan Healthcare Conference 2013
node.description: This flagship international conference will bring together a 150+ audience consisting mainly of both foreign and domestic businessmen, representatives of Azerbaijan Government and its agencies, IFIs and private sector companies including consulting, investment and private equity firms who wish to explore key investment opportunities in Azerbaijan.

node.name: 3rd edition Turkey Private Equity & Venture Capital Summit
node.description: With the rest of the world still looking down the barrel of recession, Turkey stands out as a glimmering haven of growth and good prospects, courtesy of strong fiscal controls and political determination. Driven by the recent credit rating boost, Turkey is in the fore of many investors’ minds, showing strong growth potential, a stable employment market, favourable incentives and a low debt ratio. The upcoming 2023 centenary is a focal point for the Turkish government, with each respective minist

node.name: Solar Power Mexico
node.description: Between 2010 and 2011 there has been a 150% increase in photovoltaic investments as interest in the Mexican solar power market continues to grow. Join us at Solar Power Mexico and place your organization at the forefront of this expanding market.

node.name: Wind Power Mexico
node.description: Wind Power Mexico 2012 was an exciting and timely congress that allowed the burgeoning Mexican wind industry to meet together to chart the future of this promising market. Having sold out of delegate places, sponsorship places, exhibition space and workshop attendee slots, the 2013 conference will be larger in every way to accommodate all those who wish to take part.

node.name: 2nd Mining Exploration Summit
node.description: At the 2nd Mining Exploration Summit, junior explorers and producers will convene to discover new mineral exploration opportunities, technologies, regulations, financing options and discoveries throughout Latin America. This crucial summit is for high-level mining executives interested in opportunities for new discoveries.

node.name: Mexico Mining Summit
node.description: The Mexico Mining Summit is where the major trends and opportunities for the Mexican mining sector (Silver, Copper, Gold, Iron, Steel and Coal) will be presented. The summit will cover the socio-environmental and safety challenges faced, as well as financing options. Mining updates in Mexico´s Central American neighboring countries will also be featured.

node.name: The 7th Andean Energy Summit
node.description: The 7th Andean Energy Summit is a strategic business event focused essentially on high-level investment, energy policies and project development in the Andean region, Central America and the Caribbean. The conference will analyze and discuss market trends, existing opportunities and barriers to achieve sustainable growth in the region.

node.name: Middle East Investment Conference
node.description: The CFA Institute flagship regional event, the Middle East Investment Conference, brings together noted researchers, speakers, writers, investment professionals, academics, and experts to examine these important issues. The Middle East Investment Conference is the must-attend event for senior investment professionals wanting to stay up-to-date with the latest industry developments.

node.name: Turkey & Neighbours Hotel Investment Conference
node.description: The Turkey & Neighbours Hotel Investment Conference (CATHIC) takes place 29-30 May 2013 at the Marmara Taksim Hotel, Istanbul. The full conference programme has now been released and will bring together over 65 local and global leaders to discover how to succeed in the Turkish hotel investment industry.

node.name: 2nd Annual PPP in Turkey Forum
node.description: Following on from the success of our 2012 PPP in Turkey Forum, our 2013 event will provide an update on the market and its current challenges and opportunities. Government representatives will outline existing and future projects, international experts will provide best practice advice and industry stakeholders will review the feasibility of Turkey’s ambitious plans. Our 2013 forum will provide a platform for debate and discussion with more interactive panel sessions and Q&As.

node.name: 4th Turkey Energy Forum
node.description: Join leading public and private experts in a dynamic networking and learning environment to debate and solve the current issues facing the development of the Turkish energy market.

node.name: Qatar Projects 2013
node.description: As Qatar prepares to host the FIFA World Cup in 2022, Doha will be spending more than $60bn on essential projects, including the construction of stadiums, building a metro and national rail network, improving Qatar’s roads and more than doubling the number of hotel rooms in the country.

node.name: International Islamic Finance Conference 2013
node.description: We hope that you are able to join us for this event which promises to bring together prestigious researchers and thinkers, and be a platform of choice for the exchange of invaluable ideas on issues pertaining to International Islamic Finance.

node.name: 7th Annual Turkey Trade & Export Finance Conference
node.description: Exporta returns to Istanbul on March 21 - 22 2013 for the latest instalment of one of the fastest growing conferences in our global portfolio. Regarded as the gateway between East and West, the Turkish market is rapidly becoming the planet’s hottest deal-making destination and continues to offer a wealth of opportunities to the local, regional and international trade community.

node.name: Turkey Retail Development Conference
node.description: Turkey is among the largest retail markets in the world, and on top of that increasingly attractive for local and foreign investors. Ranked 13th on the Global Retail Development Index, 8th on the Fashion Retail Index and 9th on the E-Retail Index, Turkey has established significant growth in the recent years and is slated to continue its fast development in the sector. According to a 2012 report by CBRE, Turkey ranks 14th out of 70 countries for its appeal to international retailers.

node.name: Nuclear Energy Development Summit 2013
node.description: Global energy consumption is going to increase by 50 percent by 2020, and developing countries will account for most of this demand. As the energy prices and consumption are rapidly increasing in the region, countries are currently looking for ways to produce power at lower costs, guarantee power independence and ensure energy security by investing in nuclear power plants.

node.name: 2nd Annual Port Expansion Summit
node.description: The 2nd Annual Port Expansion Summit 2013 will feature the most prominent industry leaders and government officials from across the globe providing informative and inspiring discussions pertaining to Turkey’s and Black Sea’s current needs and their ambitious future. Turkey welcomes the international community to join this forum to discover new strategies and technologies that can assist in building the port industry to accommodate the domestic and international market.

node.name: 2nd Annual Cypriot-Greek Oil & Gas 2013 Summit
node.description: Following the great success of the Cypriot-Greek Oil & Gas 2012 Summit in Larnaka last year, International Research Networks is pleased to bring you the 2nd Annual Cypriot-Greek Oil & Gas 2013 Summit once again on 18th-19th April 2013.

node.name: Lebanon Oil & Gas 2013 Summit
node.description: International Research Networks is proud to bring you the Lebanon Oil & Gas 2013 Summit, taking place from 22-23 April 2013 in Beirut, Lebanon - a must attend event that will illustrate how to best get involved in the hydrocarbon exploration in Lebanon. It will bring together all existing and future stakeholders wanting to maximize potential, get the latest updates and advance or secure their market position.

node.name: The 3rd Annual Colombia Oil & Gas Summit and Exhibition
node.description: Recognised as the premier, must-attend event for all the major stakeholders and decision makers involved in the Colombian oil & gas market.

node.name: Power & Electricity World Asia
node.description: Dubbed as the longest running, most influential and the largest power and electricity event in the Asia Pacific region for the last 15 years, Power & Electricity World Asia has been an annual platform for C-Level executives from governments, power and utility companies, energy suppliers, industry associations and service providers to discuss development, investment and partnership opportunities in Asia.

node.name: Private Banking Asia
node.description: Now in its 9th year, Private Banking Asia brings together Asia’s leading private banks, family offices and independent wealth managers to discuss strategy, investment allocations, changing business models and new business opportunities in the Asian private wealth sector.

node.name: Hedge Funds World Asia
node.description: Hedge Funds World Asia is the executive forum for Asia’s hedge funds industry. It is where senior executives from Institutional investors, hedge funds and fund of funds discuss the latest investment strategies, hedge fund allocations, portfolio management tactics and fund structuring.

node.name: The World Low Cost Airlines Congress
node.description: The World Low Cost Airlines Congress is 10 years old! And in 2013 the 10th annual event is set to be the best yet. This is the meeting place for the world’s low cost carriers and their partners.

node.name: The World National Oil Companies Congress
node.description: The World National Oil Companies Congress is now in its 7th year. Over 50% of our attendees come from oil & gas operators from across the world. Our keynote led conference sessions and focus on networking makes this the must-attend event for anyone working with NOCs or looking to work with them.

node.name: Private Equity World Africa 2013
node.description: rivate Equity World Africa 2013 is a two day conference dedicated to identifying the most exciting private equity opportunities in Africa. It brings together leading LPs and GPs to discuss opportunities presented by Africa’s emerging middle class, real estate, financial services, telecommunications, agribusiness and infrastructure.

node.name: The 2nd Mexico Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The 2nd Mexico Infrastructure Summit is part of a series of C-level infrastructure summits organized by BNamericas Events throughout Latin America. The focus of this edition will be on the new government's plans and regulatory framework for the development of new energy, social, transport and water infrastructure projects in Mexico.

node.name: The 3rd Andean Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The 3rd Andean Infrastructure Summit will focus on infrastructure projects that promote the integration of the Andean region, as well as the investment plan of the Government of Colombia. The event will also discuss the infrastructure projects benefiting from the Free Trade Agreement signed with the United States, in which 40 billion Colombian pesos will be invested and which are considered as the bridge to the rest of the world.

node.name: The Mexico Energy Summit
node.description: The Mexico Energy Summit will feature energy investment, project development and policies under Mexico's new government, essentially in the Upstream, Downstream, Renewable Energy and Power Generation sectors. Given the current situation in Mexico, the summit will uncover answers to where the future of PEMEX lies, whether there is a boom of renewable energy and what Shale developments are taking place.

node.name: 8th Annual Middle East Retail Banking Forum
node.description: Fleming Gulf is back with the 8th Annual Middle East Retail Banking Forum where leaders and the regional giants in retail banking will gather across 3 days and will be “Synergizing Retail into Retail Banking.”. Discussions based on best practices, successful stories, case studies, strategies and new business models will be the highlight of this epic event.

node.name: LATAM RAIL OPPORTUNITIES 2013
node.description: Globalisation has changed the way people used to travel from one country to another but there is ample of opportunity for growth in railways in South America connecting countries in South America. There is a major boom in the railway industry in South America, notably in Brazil. Apart from the deep lack in infrastructure, mainly due to decades of priority given from the government to the highways, there are some important factors pushing the trend forward.The recent deep sea oil fields discover

node.name: Asia Pacific Rail 2013
node.description: Asia Pacific Rail 2013 is the region’s leading railway event, where operators, government authorities, international leading consultants and solutions providers discuss growth opportunities, new investment strategies, and service innovation.

node.name: Myanmar International Trade & Investment Summit
node.description: Following democratic reform and the ending of international sanctions, Myanmar is predicted high levels of economic growth in the coming years and is widely tipped to be the next “rising star” in Asia. Myanmar is currently experiencing record levels of international investment with investors showing huge levels of interest in a country that boasts plentiful natural resources, a young labour force, and close proximity to some of the world’s most dynamic economies, including India and China.

node.name: The Annual Investment Meeting
node.description: The Annual Investment Meeting has reached new heights as its second edition witnessed record participation from countries around the globe and its quality rich programme attracted high profile attendance from the regional and international investment and trade communities. AIM 2012 accomplished concrete and tangible results as sizeable transactions were realized translating into millions of dollars of new development projects and an array of newly concluded MoUs and cooperation agreements.

node.name: The 4th Indexing & ETF Investments China
node.description: The 4th Indexing & ETF Investments ChinaTM has the largest, longest and most respected reputation as the most superior event in China and Asia. This is the one event that the most senior decision makers block their calendars for. The Indexing & ETF Investments ChinaTM conference boasts over a 1,000 high-level delegates (institutional investors, QDIIs…), Over 80 speakers & Panelist from China and overseas sharing their insights on ETF research, design and product as well as the market performance

node.name: Africa Energy Indaba
node.description: The Africa Energy Indaba, adopted by the World Energy Council (WEC) as the African regional event of the WEC, receives global recognition as the foremost event for energy professionals from across the globe and is rapidly gaining momentum as the energy business forum in Africa.
